english.segment1: I'm gonna leave this place, I swear this time I'm running home. I know this place too well that promises I'll be alone. Somewhere between here and there and back and forth I'll come around.
english.segment2: It's what I want to tell you.. it's been so very long. since I've been man enough to be the kind of man.. if I'm gonna hold your hand.
english.segment3: I was reminded of the lack of who I am, swallowed hard. And in the night I took a firefly or a shooting star. I watched the sun come up and burn away this feeling over me. It'll be ok, you'll see.
english.segment4: [CHORUS]. ..to be the kind of man I'm supposed to be. [CHORUS]
